pageProduct.name: Pinetarsol Solution 200mL
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Relieves itching and inflammed skin associated with dermatitis,anal and genital itching,chicken pox,napkin rash,sunburn,prickly heat,hives,insect bites and other skin irritations. Relieves the syptomsof psoriasis.An alternative to soap, as soap may irritate tender,reddened skin.

Warnings

Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.

Ingredients

* Pine Tar 2.3% * Triethanolamine laudry sulfate 6%

Directions

One capful contains 10ml. Do not use soap on affected areas. For very inflamed skin, use with water. Shake bottle before use.

Bath: Add 15-30ml to a warm to tepid bath (5ml baby bath or basin). Bathe for 15-10 minutes once daily, more often for severe cases. Pat skin dry.

Shower: Apply directly to wet skin, leave for few minutes then rinse. Pat skin dry.

Small areas: Add 10ml to 3 litres of cool water or iced water, saturate cotton wool and hold on areas for a few minutes. Pat skin dry.

Patients in bed: Measles, geriatric, surgical patients. Add 10ml to 3 litres of warm water, sponge. Pat skin dry.

Dry skin and eczema: Use 'Pinetarsol Bath Oil'. Also available as 'Pinetarsol Gel' and 'Pinetarsol Bar'.
